title: Michael Bolton - How Am I Supposed To Live Without You
description:
Michael Bolton's official music video for 'How Am I Supposed To Live Without You'. Click to listen to Michael Bolton on Spotify: http://smarturl.it/MichaelBoltonSpotify?IQid=MichaelBHAI

As featured on The Essential Michael Bolton. Click to buy the track or album via iTunes: http://smarturl.it/EssentialMichaelB?IQid=MichaelBHAI
Google Play: http://smarturl.it/HAISTLWYGPlay?IQid=MichaelBHAI
Amazon: http://smarturl.it/EssentialMBAmazon?IQid=MichaelBHAI

More From Michael Bolton
Said I Loved You...But I Lied: https://youtu.be/bv5vMJKBAbo
How Am I Supposed To Live Without You: https://youtu.be/YFood_bTOX4
Missing You Now: https://youtu.be/xo-jCrIRb9g

More great 80s videos here: http://smarturl.it/Ultimate80?IQid=MichaelBHAI

Twitter: https://twitter.com/mbsings

Subscribe to Michael Bolton on YouTube: http://smarturl.it/MichaelBoltonSub?IQid=MichaelBHAI

---------

Lyrics: 

I could hardly believe it
When I heard the news today
I had to come and get it straight from you
They said you were leavin'
Someone's swept your heart away
From the look upon your face, I see it's true
So tell me all about it, tell me 'bout the
plans you're makin'
Then tell me one thing more before I go

Tell me how am I supposed to live without you
Now that I've been lovin' you so long
How am I supposed to live without you
How am I supposed to carry on
When all that I've been livin' for is gone

new_description:
Experience the Passionate Melodies of Michael Bolton

Michael Bolton has remained a prominent figure in the music industry due to his unforgettable voice and emotive songwriting. His iconic song, "How Am I Supposed To Live Without You", continues to connect with people worldwide. This article delves into the essence of the song, its lasting impact, and offers insights into exploring more of Bolton’s music.

Explore More of Michael Bolton's Hits

The journey into Michael Bolton's music doesn’t end here. Discover an array of his greatest hits that highlight his exceptional vocal talent and deeply moving lyrics:

  • Said I Loved You... But I Lied: Watch here
  • How Am I Supposed To Live Without You: Watch here (Official Music Video)
  • Missing You Now: Watch here

These tracks illustrate why Bolton's music is cherished across generations. His artistry continues to create connections with listeners, transcending cultural and emotional boundaries.

Discover More Classics from the 80s

For those who love the vibrant sounds of the 1980s, uncover a curated collection of iconic hits from this decade. Click here to journey back to a time of groundbreaking musical creativity and captivating melodies.

Connect with Michael Bolton

Fans can stay informed with Michael Bolton’s newest updates by following him on social media:

  • Follow on Facebook
  • Follow on Twitter

Exploring the Lyrics

At the heart of Michael Bolton’s music are songs that explore themes of love, emotion, and reflection. The words in "How Am I Supposed To Live Without You" offer a glimpse into these timeless topics:

I could hardly believe it
When I heard the news today
I had to come and get it straight from you
They said you were leavin'
Someone's swept your heart away
